A mortgage originator negotiates home mortgage loans, refers applicants to creditors, and selects creditors for credit requests. A mortgage broker is someone who engages in activities related to home mortgage loans for compensation. This includes accepting applications, soliciting loans, negotiating terms, and selling existing loans to lenders. This definition also includes employees or agents of creditors.
